timeline.message:
DEV-1108 Merge OutputCopy with OutputArchiver

New information made us decide to just push straight to the archive
after the completion of the `bcl2fastq` processing. This commit thus
also removes the output bucket argument.

Also remove the `Aligner` interface as there is a single implementation
now.

timeline.bodyText: Thinking we may want to name this "output" bucket instead as the use of it is no longer purely archival.
timeline.author: pauldwolfe

timeline.bodyText: Feel like removing the Aligner interface probably should have been in another ticket, not really related to adding an archiver to bcl2fastq (but fine to keep it in this commit)
timeline.author: pauldwolfe
